name: Astar (Last Resort)
text:
...[Player].
I've always...
wanted to be like this with you.

name: Astar (Last Resort)
text:
And, at a deeper level...
With you...

The two, gently swayed by the calm waves,
cuddled on the board and gazed at the fireworks.

And with that, [Player]
spent an unforgettably
long night with Astar.
